items.playlist_name: PLAYLISTs from USB device

channel.title: <font color="#00ccff">"*.xml"</font> - Playlist from USB
channel.description:
Playlist from USB memory stick!

nStream.xml

Rename your playlist as "nStream.xml" and copy to USB memory stick, then connect it to your TV
Плейлист на флешке ! Назовите ваш плейлист
" nStream.xml ", скопируйте его на флешку и подключите флешку к телевизору.

channel.title: <font color="#00ccff">"*.m3u"</font> - Playlist from USB
channel.description:
Playlist from USB memory stick!

nStream.m3u

Rename your playlist as "nStream.m3u" and copy to USB memory stick, then connect it to your TV
Плейлист на флешке ! Назовите ваш плейлист
" nStream.m3u ", скопируйте его на флешку и подключите флешку к телевизору.

channel.title: USB PORTS Scanner
channel.description:
USB PORTS Scanner
View files and folders on your USB devices
СКАНЕР USB ПОРТОВ
Просмотр файлов и папок на USB накопителях.
